snippet: A rescue worker falls in love with a virologist and single mother during a devastating outbreak of avian flu in the Korean disaster film “Flu.”
abstract: Jeannette Catsoulis reviews movie Flu, directed by Kim Sung-soo and starring Jang Hyuk.
lead_paragraph: A rescue worker falls in love with a virologist and single mother during a devastating outbreak of avian flu in the Korean disaster film “Flu.”

headline.seo: Young Koreans Try to Survive an Epidemic in ‘Flu’
headline.main: Love in a Time of Quarantine
